venue.name: Cape Cod Canal Herring Run Parking Lot

item.description:
Just another warm up for the MV Bike Ride... Doc says I shouldn't run yet so I have to ride myself skinny... so help me out.

Haven't decided if we are doing the whole 14 miles or just 7... I guess it depends on how long my day is... You can do whatever you like though...

You can bring your kids but they should probably be at least 10 and able to keep up. We're not going to race but we don't want any senior citizens in their scooters passing us... you know what I mean? 

Dinner at Krua Thai After... 100 Main St Buzzards Bay

Krua Thai 100 Main St, Buzzards Bay, MA (508) 759-9662 ‎
item.how_to_find_us: Look For My Blue Toyota Sienna Van with the Bike Rack

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Bike Ride - Cape Cod Canal - Herring Run
